actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to extend the maximum age for eligibility for the financial assistance program of the Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps by the period of time, not to exceed four years, that a student previously served on active duty in the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Extends the maximum age for eligibility for the financial assistance program of the Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps by the period of time that a student previously served on active duty in the armed forces, not to exceed four years.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to extend the maximum age for eligibility for the financial assistance program of the Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps by the period of time, not to exceed four years, that a student previously served on active duty in the Armed Forces.
